page.syntax: .Set( Logical_Image_Name as C, Real_Image_Name as C )

argument.name: Logical_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of the logical image associated with the existing image.

argument.name: Real_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of an existing image.

page.description: The .Set() method sets the value of an existing or new logical image name in the string dictionary.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% image_1=$a5_folder image_2=$a5_folder_open %str%) ? nm.get("image_2") = "$a5_folder_open" nm.set("image_2", "$a5_disk_drive") ? nm.get("image_2") = "$a5_disk_drive" nm.set("image_3", "$a5_disk_drive") ? nm.get("image_3") = "$a5_disk_drive"
